Whittier.East Whittier, California: East Whittier is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) in Los Angeles County, California, United States. The population was 9,757 at the 2010 census, up from 9,538 at the 2000 census. The name was changed from East La Mirada in 2012, likely due to its precise location in relation to the city of Whittier.
